title: Moreno Valley, California
summary: Moreno Valley is a city in Riverside County, California and is part of the Riverside-San Bernardino-Ontario Metropolitan Area. It is the second-largest city in Riverside County by population and one of the Inland Empire's population centers. As of the 2010 census,[10] the city's population was 193,365. Moreno Valley is also part of the larger Greater Los Angeles area.
